alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 7:10PM CST until January 01 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Freezing fog and patchy freezing drizzle are also possible an may result in slick travel on untreated surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will impact New Years Eve travel. Use caution when out traveling tonight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
